questions.question: Is complex installation required?
questions.answer: No. If you already have cameras/microphones - we'll connect Gideone in minutes. Without existing equipment, we provide a complete turnkey solution.

questions.question: What if employees object to cameras?
questions.answer: In 9 out of 10 cases, staff perceive Gideone as an assistant, not surveillance. The system doesn't punish but teaches: new hires adapt faster, experienced employees earn bonuses for high ratings.

questions.question: How soon will I see results?
questions.answer: First changes appear in 3-5 days: employees start mentioning promotions more often. Average ticket growth comes in weeks 2-3.

questions.question: How does Gideone integrate with existing training?
questions.answer: The system complements training - reinforces knowledge in practice and identifies development areas.

questions.question: What about privacy?
questions.answer: We use encryption, store audio-video temporarily - only text analytics remain in reports. All data protection requirements are strictly followed.

questions.question: How can I verify it actually works?
questions.answer: Typically in the first month, average ticket increases by 10-15%. We also reduce control and coaching costs, while dashboards show all statistics.

questions.question: Can scripts and rules be modified later?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Make changes via web interface, and the system instantly adapts to new phrases and standards.
